summary: the fast-casual chain will work with the postmates app to begin offering delivery for online and mobile orders in 67 cities , according to a report in nation 's restaurant news . but mexican food fans should know that the restaurant plans to add a nine per cent service charge - with the delivery fees for postmates beginning at $ 5 and up , depending on distance and demand . the app hires independent contractors who drive their own cars in a similar model to uber taxis .

aspect: 1. Chipotle has decided to join the food delivery market by partnering with Postmates to deliver burritos to customers' doors.
2. The popular Mexican restaurant chain has turned down previous offers from third-party delivery services but has now collaborated with Postmates.
3. Chipotle is cashing in on the lucrative delivery market by partnering with Postmates and adding a 9% service charge for delivery fees starting at $5.
explain: The aspect explains that Chipotle has decided to join the food delivery market by partnering with Postmates to deliver burritos to customers' doors. This means that customers will now be able to order their favorite Chipotle items online or through the Chipotle app and have them delivered to their homes. This partnership will allow Chipotle to reach a wider audience and offer more convenient options for their customers.

The aspect states that the popular Mexican restaurant chain has previously turned down offers from third-party delivery services but has now collaborated with Postmates. This suggests that the restaurant chain was initially hesitant to work with such services but has now changed its stance and is now working with Postmates. This could indicate that the restaurant chain may have recognized the potential benefits of offering delivery services and the demand from customers for such services.

Chipotle has partnered with Postmates to offer delivery services in 67 cities for their online and mobile orders. In order to use this service, customers will be charged a 9% service charge on top of the delivery fees, which start at $5. This collaboration and the addition of a service charge is a strategy by Chipotle to capitalize on the profitable delivery market.
